review_blob: I expected a lot out of this when I tried it in San Diego. However, its skunky taste made me drink the water at my table with my meal instead. Dont get the hype. A Redhook IPA blows this away.

Despite the low ratings here, the fact is it has taken off in test markets and will rollout nationwide next year. People have told Anheuser-Busch theyd driven 100 miles to get it! Coastal markets cant keep enough of it in stock. So all the beer snobs better be ready to see it right next to Corona in EVERY beer store in the country.
Anyone who says they dont like this beer is lying because they are just trying to be a "beer snob". iIts #1 in the WORLD for a reason, because everybody drinks it.
Great light beer thats cold filtered and has corn for sweetness. Beats Miller Lite hands down.
